hopobject.name: green
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_8_5) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/48.0.2552.0 Safari/537.36
hopobject.body: <select class="dropdown" id="buy-green"> <option>Select a distributor to buy</option> <optgroup label="North America"> <option value="http://www.mouser.com/new/seeedstudio/seeed-studio-beaglebone-green/">Mouser</option> <option value="http://www.digikey.com/product-search/en?keywords=beaglebone%20green">Digi-Key</option> <option value="http://www.microcenter.com/product/455939/BeagleBone_Green">Micro Center</option> <option value="http://store.hackaday.com/products/beagle-bone-green">Hackaday Store</option> <option value="http://www.seeed.cc/beaglebone_green/">Seeed Studio</option> </optgroup> <optgroup label="South America (Brazil)"> <option value="http://br.mouser.com/new/seeedstudio/seeed-studio-beaglebone-green/">Mouser</option> <option value="http://www.seeed.cc/beaglebone_green/">Seeed Studio</option> </optgroup> <optgroup label="Europe"> <option value="http://www.mouser.de/new/seeedstudio/seeed-studio-beaglebone-green/">Mouser</option> <option value="http://www.seeed.cc/beaglebone_green/">Seeed Studio</option> </optgroup> <optgroup label="Japan"> <option value="http://www.mouser.jp/new/seeedstudio/seeed-studio-beaglebone-green/">Mouser</option> <option value="http://www.seeed.cc/beaglebone_green/">Seeed Studio</option> </optgroup> <optgroup label="China"> <option value="http://www.mouser.cn/new/seeedstudio/seeed-studio-beaglebone-green/">Mouser</option> <option value="http://www.seeed.cc/beaglebone_green/">Seeed Studio</option> </optgroup> <optgroup label="India"> <option value="http://www.mouser.in/new/seeedstudio/seeed-studio-beaglebone-green/">Mouser</option> <option value="http://www.seeed.cc/beaglebone_green/">Seeed Studio</option> </optgroup> <optgroup label="Asia Pacific"> <option value="http://www.mouser.sg/new/seeedstudio/seeed-studio-beaglebone-green/">Mouser</option> <option value="http://www.seeed.cc/beaglebone_green/">Seeed Studio</option> </optgroup> </select> <script> $('select.dropdown').each(function(){ var list = $(this); var action = list.attr('id'); list.change(function(){ $('option:selected', this).each(function(){ var label = $(this).text(); var link = $(this).val(); ga('send', 'event', 'exit', action, label); setTimeout('document.location = "' + link + '"', 100) }); }); }); </script>
